Finding whakapapa: How Chris Mirams’ discovery of his Māori heritage helped him grieve for his mum https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/finding-my-whakapapa-how-the-discovery-of-my-maori-heritage-helped-me-grieve-my-mum-chris-mirams/3QD5FXVWSFGG5BITWZABVFQDT4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/finding-my-whakapapa-how-the-discovery-of-my-maori-heritage-helped-me-grieve-my-mum-chris-mirams/3QD5FXVWSFGG5BITWZABVFQDT4/ Chris MiramsBlonde and blue eyed Pākeha TV reporter finds his Māori whakapapa Sat, 19 Oct 2024 17:00:00 +0000 “For people like me – non-Māori, Māori, if you like – it feels like the net has been cast wider and we’re being welcomed with a warm embrace,” writes Chris Mirams on connecting to his mother’s whakapapa. (Photo supplied)
